document_data.name: Khaspere Drylund
document_data.mainbody: '''Khaspere Drylund''' was a noble in [[Yartar]] sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.Activities: Khaspere was the proprietor of the ''[[Grand Dame]]'', a riverboat housing a gambling hall. He was secretly a member of the [[Kraken Society]] and was plotting to become the new water baron of the city.
document_data.History: In the late 1480s or early 1490s DR, Khaspere was a high-ranking member of the [[Kraken Society|Krakenar]], and he knew the location where the missing [[storm giant]] king [[Hekaton]] was chained.
document_data.Personality: Khaspere was a little man. If someone cornered and threatened him, he revealed everything about his criminal business.
document_data.Powers: He had a telepathic link to [[Slarkrethel]], which was constantly active if they remained on the same plane. The [[kraken]] could harm Khaspere and even kill him instantly if it so desired.
